common.tagline: Platform-independent memory and toolkit for AI agents

hero.title: Your AI's Universal Memory
hero.subtitle: Give your AI agents, GPTs, and robots a platform-independent vault. Store skills, personas, and MCP servers - switch between AI platforms without losing anything.

personas.title: Personas
personas.description: Define system prompts and AI personalities that work across any platform

skills.title: Skills
skills.description: Create reusable capabilities and task definitions in Anthropic skill format

mcp.title: MCP Servers
mcp.description: Configure Model Context Protocol servers for tools and resources

memory.title: Memory
memory.description: Persistent key-value storage your AI can read and write to

formats.title: Multi-Format Export
formats.description: JSON, OpenAPI for GPTs, MCP protocol, or human-readable Markdown

api.title: API Key Access
api.description: Let your AI write back - update memory, skills, and personas programmatically

step1.title: Create a Playbook
step1.description: Define your personas, skills, and MCP configurations in one place

step2.title: Publish & Share
step2.description: Get a unique URL that serves your playbook in any format

step3.title: Connect Your AI
step3.description: Give the URL to your GPT, Claude, or any AI agent

publicRepo.title: Community Repository
publicRepo.description: Browse and add pre-built skills and MCP servers created by the community

hero.title: Enterprise AI Orchestration
hero.subtitle: Standardize how your team works with AI. Create shared playbooks for onboarding, best practices, and consistent AI behavior across your organization.

onboarding.title: AI-Powered Onboarding
onboarding.description: New employees or AI agents instantly learn your processes by downloading standardized playbooks

bestPractices.title: Codified Best Practices
bestPractices.description: Turn tribal knowledge into structured skills that any AI can follow

consistency.title: Consistent AI Behavior
consistency.description: Every team member's AI assistant follows the same guidelines and procedures

governance.title: AI Governance
governance.description: Control what skills and capabilities are available to AI agents in your organization

dashboard.noPlaybooks: You don't have any playbooks yet

apiKeys.title: API Keys
apiKeys.description: Generate keys to let AI agents write back to this playbook
apiKeys.name: Key Name
apiKeys.copyWarning: Copy this key now - you won't see it again!
